short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically fetches Canvas class grade and calculates the required score on your final exam to receive your desired grade.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Note: Access to "all sites" is to allow the extension to work on all variations of Canvas/Instructure URLs.

Instructions: Pin extension for ease of access. Navigate to the 'Grades' section of your Canvas class and open the extension. Input the necessary information to calculate necessary final exam grade. 

Source Code: https://github.com/leongmichael/CanvasFinalGradeCalculator
